epd_owner_contact.address: Level 40, Northpoint Tower, 100 Miller St, North Sydney NSW 2060, Australia

epd_produced_by_contact.address: Level 3, Greenhouse, 180 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000 Australia

epd_process_certified_by_contact.address: Suite 2600, 101 Marietta St NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, USA

epd_metadata.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

hazardous_substances.notes: None of the products contain substances listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for authorisation.

product_description.packaging: Delivered in bulk with no packaging.

lca_information.scope: Cradle to gate (modules A1-A3) with options modules A4-A5, modules C1-C4 and module D
lca_information.reference_service_life: Not specified; scope is cradle to delivery

background_data_preferences: Product specific EPDs for cements, admixtures, pigments and fibres
Australian National Life Cycle Inventory Database (AusLCI v1.42) (2023)

allocation.method: Physical allocation based on weight or m3 of concrete; economic allocation used when physical allocation not possible

excluded: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to and from work
cut_off_criteria.included: All materials required for manufacturing delivered without packaging except packaging of materials

data_quality.assessment: Good or very good geographic and temporal representativeness
data_quality.background_data_timeliness: All data updated within 10 years as required under PCR 2019:14

processes_included.upstream: Extraction, transport and manufacturing of raw materials; generation of electricity for modules A1 and A3
processes_included.core: External transportation of materials, manufacturing of concrete (excluding mixing), treatment of waste and wastewater
processes_included.downstream: Distribution, installation, wastage, transport and treatment of waste at end of life

lca_information.other_environmental_information: Module D indicates environmental benefits from reuse, recovery, and recycling of deconstructed concrete

installation.operational_control: Holcim does not have operational control over installation
installation.assumptions: Based on industrial expertise and GCCA tool
installation.notes: Concrete slabs manually finished; no additional inputs modelled

deconstruction.process: Physical process of drilling and removing concrete using hydraulic excavator

benefits_and_loads_beyond_system_boundar.use_of_recycled_aggregate: Recycled aggregate replaces virgin coarse aggregate depending on product performance requirements

targets.2030: Embodied carbon of all construction materials to be at least 40% lower
targets.2050: All new construction materials to be net zero

carbonation.description: Natural process where concrete absorbs CO2 from atmosphere through chemical reaction
carbonation.consideration: Not included in this EPD; recommended to consider in whole-of-life building studies per BS EN 16757:2017

allocation_approach.fly_ash: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included
allocation_approach.ground_granulated_blast_furnace_slag: Allocated economically due to significant economic value
allocation_approach.silica_fume: Treated as waste material; only transport impacts included

recycled_materials_handling.background_data_allocation: AusLCI LCA database allocation approach adopted for secondary data and processes

additional_info.product_group_classification: UN CPC 375 (Articles of concrete, cement and plaster)

NSW_ACT.composition: Black coal (75%), photovoltaic (17%), natural gas (3%), hydropower (3%), others (2%)

QLD.composition: Black coal (71%), natural gas (12%), photovoltaic (8%), oil (4%), others (5%)

SA.composition: Wind power (61%), natural gas (34%), photovoltaic (4%), others (1%)

VIC.composition: Natural gas (44%), brown coal (41%), wind power (8%), hydropower (3%), others (4%)

WA.composition: Natural gas (65%), wind power (26%), black coal (8%), others (1%)

additional_info.disclaimer: Results are relative statements and do not indicate endpoints, thresholds, safety margins or risks. Some impact categories have high uncertainties.
